pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wasserstein Barycenter // Computation of a Wasserstein Barycenter. The package implements a method described in Cuturi (2014) "Fast Computation of Wasserstein Barycenters". The paper is available at http://jmlr.org/proceedings/papers/v32/cuturi14.pdf. To speed up the computation time the main iteration step is based on 'RcppArmadillo'.
